author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DEBBY NEARING LANDFALL IN THE FLORIDA BIG BEND... ...400 AM EDT POSITION UPDATE...
summary:
...DEBBY NEARING LANDFALL IN THE FLORIDA BIG BEND... ...400 AM EDT POSITION UPDATE...
 As of 4:00 AM EDT Mon Aug 5
 the center of Debby was located near 29.3, -83.7
 with movement NNE at 12 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 981 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.
